title: 136F.44 ADMINISTRATIVE INTERACTION WITH STUDENTS.
text:
As part of their annual goal setting activity, all unrepresented system and campus academic administrators are encouraged to substantially increase their interaction with students through activities such as teaching a regularly scheduled course or serving as an academic advisor. Actions to increase the interaction of students and administrators under this section shall not displace permanent faculty or staff.
[Repealed, 2014 c 149 s 75]
